tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WorkoutPrograms (
  workout_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id UUID REFERENCES Athletes(athlete_id),
  program_name STRING,
  program_description STRING,
  duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE Athletes (athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY, athlete_name VARCHAR(255), goal VARCHAR(255), fitness_level VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE WorkoutPrograms (program_id INT PRIMARY KEY, program_name VARCHAR(255), program_intensity VARCHAR(50), program_duration INT)
CREATE TABLE WorkoutSessions (session_id INT PRIMARY KEY, session_date DATE, athlete_id INT, program_id INT)

CREATE TABLE Athletes (
    athlete_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    weight DECIMAL,
    height DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Athletes (
  athlete_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT NOT NULL,
  height FLOAT NOT NULL,
  weight FLOAT NOT NULL,
  goal VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Workouts (
  workout_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  workout_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  duration INT NOT NULL,
  intensity VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE AthleteWorkoutHistory (
  history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT NOT NULL,
  workout_id INT NOT NULL,
  completed_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE FitnessLevels (
  level_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  level_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE AthleteFitnessData (
  data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  athlete_id INT NOT NULL,
  level_id INT NOT NULL,
  weight_progress FLOAT NOT NULL,
  workout_sessions INT NOT NULL
)
